thread.title: Grant bridges educational divide in Ga.
thread.title_full: Grant bridges educational divide in Ga.

title: Grant bridges educational divide in Ga.
text:
21 Grant bridges educational divide in Ga. 
eSchool News: The James M. Cox Foundation announced today a $288,500 grant to EveryoneOn. The grant will fund a pilot program providing 1,500 tablet computers, preloaded with educational content, to families in Georgia who are enrolling in Cox Communicationsâ€™ Connect2Compete discounted internet service program.
